member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService
member.summary: This class provides methods to manipulate records.

member.summary: Adds a new record to the list.
member.param: A record to add to the list.
member.exception: Thrown when person's first or last name is null, empty or consists only of white-space characters.

member.summary: Allows user to edit the data of the record with ID.
member.param: The ID of the record to edit.
A record to replace old one with.
member.exception: Thrown when new record is null.

members.member:
Searches for the records with the first name value equal to .
The first name of the person. The array of records if they're found or an empty array if not. Thrown when the first name if null.>

Searches for the records with the last name value equal to .
The last name of the person. The array of records if they're found or an empty array if not. Thrown when the last name if null.>
